question: 9 (b)
sols_html:
We use the ratio test:

\[\begin{aligned} \lim_{n\to\infty} \left|\frac{2(n+1)+1}{2^{2(n+1)+1}} \cdot \frac{2^{2n+1}}{2n+1}\right| &= \lim_{n\to\infty} \frac{2n+3}{2n+1} \cdot \frac{2^{2n+1}}{2^{2n+3}} \\ &= \lim_{n\to\infty} \frac{2+\tfrac{3}{n}}{2+\tfrac{1}{n}} \cdot \frac{1}{2^2} \\ &= \frac{1}{4} \\ & < 1\end{aligned}\]

So by the ratio test, the series converges.
